title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7403.8 - Personal hygiene and clothing issue
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7403.8 - Personal hygiene and clothing issue

State Regulations

Upon admission, all residents shall be provided with
personal hygiene items and clothing as required by Part 7419 of this

Title. Notes

ยง
7403.8

Renumbered from subtitle AA of chapter III
New

York State Register April 11, 2018/Volume XL, Issue 15, eff. 4/11/2018

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
